Docs.summary: Represents a strategy capable of selecting a reduced set of tools for a chat request.
Docs.remarks:
A tool reduction strategy is invoked prior to sending a request to an underlying , enabling scenarios where a large tool catalog must be trimmed to fit provider limits or to improve model tool selection quality.
The implementation should return a non- enumerable. Returning the original instance indicates no change. Returning a different enumerable indicates the caller may replace the existing tool list.
